biotools.summary: Estimate gene expression from prokaryotic RNA-seq.It uses Bowtie2 for alignment but, unlike TopHat and Cufflinks, does not allow spliced alignments. It also handles overlapping genes, a common phenomenon in bacteria that is largely absent in eukaryotes.

bioschemas.name: EDGE-pro
bioschemas.summary: Estimate gene expression from prokaryotic RNA-seq.It uses Bowtie2 for alignment but, unlike TopHat and Cufflinks, does not allow spliced alignments. It also handles overlapping genes, a common phenomenon in bacteria that is largely absent in eukaryotes.
